mapper.select: SELECT UID,s.ID,s.NAME,s.CATEGORY,s.NUMBER,s.WORTH,specification,unit FROM STOCK s WHERE STATUS='normal'
SELECT UID,s.ID,s.NAME,s.CATEGORY,s.NUMBER,s.WORTH,specification,unit FROM STOCK s WHERE STATUS='normal' and s.ID = #{id}
SELECT UID,s.ID,s.NAME,s.CATEGORY,s.NUMBER,s.WORTH,specification,unit FROM STOCK s WHERE STATUS='normal' and s.UID = #{uid}
mapper.delete: UPDATE STOCK SET status='deleted' WHERE UID=#{uid}
mapper.update: UPDATE STOCK SET specification=#{specification}, unit = #{unit}, ID=#{id}, NAME = #{name}, CATEGORY=#{category}, NUMBER=#{number}, WORTH=#{worth} WHERE UID=#{uid}
UPDATE STOCK SET specification=#{specification}, unit = #{unit}, NAME = #{name}, CATEGORY=#{category}, NUMBER=#{number}, WORTH=#{worth} WHERE ID=#{id}
